title: resetting ranked stats
body: okay, so i have been in bronze since season 2, and i have improved a lot, I have been able to carry most of my games, but i am not able to get out of bronze cause of afk's and "trolls" , I dont want to make a new acount because i have spent a lot of money into this account,  so im wondering if riot could add  something which you can buy in the store using rp which resets your ranked stats

replies.body:
So you problem is with trolls, but by giving them the ability to reset their ranked stats back to the average, not only that will increase the average rank, still leaving you under average, but they will have even less incentive to try, as they can screw up many games and then buy a token to nullify that completely, then do it again.

Also, the enemy team has just as many trolls and afk's as your team does, and if your team has significantly more, im going out on a limb and saying your attitude may have something to do with that as you are the only difference between the two teams.
